contextId.information: "welcomed ... as fellow workers" or "welcomed ... with honor" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
contextId.quote: gave ... the right hand of fellowship

contextId.information: "Mount Sinai" is a synecdoche for the law that Moses gave to the Israelites there. AT: "Mount Sinai, where Moses gave the law to Israel" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_synecdoche]])
